com.github.katjahahn.sections

Class SectionTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.katjahahn.PEModule
      • com.github.katjahahn.sections.SectionTable

  • public class SectionTable
extends PEModule
    Represents the section table of a PE. Is usually constructed by the PELoader.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ENTRY_SIZE
      Size of one entry is 40

      • getSectionEntry

        public SectionTableEntry getSectionEntry(java.lang.String sectionName)
        Returns the section entry that has the given name or null if there is no section with that name. If there are several sections with the same name, the first one will be returned. TODO there might be several sections with the same name. Provide a better way to fetch them.
        Parameters:
        sectionName -
        Returns:
        the section table entry that has the given sectionName
